hero.heading: Build the Future of Bitcoin in Vancouver
hero.subheading: Join our community of builders, learners, and Bitcoin enthusiasts exploring Layer 2 solutions and Lightning Network

sections.title: Welcome to Builder Vancouver
sections.body: Builder Vancouver is a community-driven meetup focused on Bitcoin education, Lightning Network development, and Layer 2 exploration. We bring together developers, enthusiasts, and curious minds to learn, build, and advance Bitcoin technology together.

sections.title: What We Do
sections.body: We host regular meetups featuring technical presentations, hands-on workshops, and collaborative building sessions. Whether you're a seasoned Bitcoin developer or just getting started, there's a place for you in our community.

meta.title: Builder Vancouver | Bitcoin Meetups & Education
meta.description: Join Builder Vancouver for Bitcoin meetups, Lightning Network education, and Layer 2 exploration. Connect with the local Bitcoin community.
